channel.title: Floor lvl not showing floor when i go upstairs!
channel.description:
when i click in yanille to go upstairs its all invisble i have to relog or switch to low detail or high something that kinda refreshes the client otherwise ther ewould be nothin under me all i woudl see is hiegh 1 and hiegh 2 whould be invisble until i relog or switch detail the ive trtied a diferent servers around 80 server over 2 days and i give up i need help wat should i do to make the floor lvl visible again? all i know that the problem has to do with client.java also if u have time what should i do so each time a person logs in the brightnes wouldnt be 3 but 4 were do i change that? thank :)
